overview:
Uday Singania is founder of network11ads.com which provides online marketing services from small to large corporate companies.

Uday Singania has MBA degree from IIM Ahmedabad, Uday singania is popularly known for its online marketing strategies.

In past Uday Singania has worked with flipkart, flipkart became No.1 E-commerce website in two years after the online marketing strategies implemented by uday singania.

In 2010 Uday Singania quite the job & started network11ads.
